version_description:
• Multiple stability and functional improvements
• Update to Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
• Added in-app link to knowledge base definitions guide

• Multiple stability and functional improvements
• Update to Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
• Added in-app link to knowledge base definitions guide
• Updated iOS 9 support
• Updated iOS 9 support
• Renaming of app to "Analytics"
• Renaming of app to "Analytics"
App renamed to "Analytics"
App renamed to "Analytics"
• Miscellaneous improvements
• Miscellaneous improvements

• Touch ID is now supported in the app for logging into your site.
• Stability improvements & miscellaneous bug fixes.

• Touch ID is now supported in the app for logging into your site.
• Stability improvements & miscellaneous bug fixes.

• Improve how we calculate percentages in list tiles — calculated based on all items, not just of items shown.
• Fixed issue where the “last refresh date” was sometimes inaccurate.
• Fixed issue when rearranging tiles would not rearrange correctly.<

• Improve how we calculate percentages in list tiles — calculated based on all items, not just of items shown.
• Fixed issue where the “last refresh date” was sometimes inaccurate.
• Fixed issue when rearranging tiles would not rearrange correctly.<

• Fixed issue which prevented seeing the tiles on the bottom of the list under some circumstances
• Fixed rare bug that happened when trying to remove pages
• Improved how we display some error messages
• Improved site selector screen's appearanc

• Fixed issue which prevented seeing the tiles on the bottom of the list under some circumstances
• Fixed rare bug that happened when trying to remove pages
• Improved how we display some error messages
• Improved site selector screen's appearanc

• Improved error messages to make it more clear when some things go wrong.
• Improved how we display site names and tiles when the titles are too long.
• Other UI and internal improvements.

• Improved error messages to make it more clear when some things go wrong.
• Improved how we display site names and tiles when the titles are too long.
• Other UI and internal improvements.

• UI and performance improvements
• Discontinued support for the Analytics Apple Watch app

• UI and performance improvements
• Discontinued support for the Analytics Apple Watch app

• We've added a date picker that allows for easy switching between time ranges (Today, This Week, This Month) for all metrics available.
• All metric tiles are now shown by default. None are hidden.
• Improved discoverability of adding another Squ

Introducing Traffic Alerts: Stay on top of your online business and get notified when your site sees more visitors than usual, and discover why. We're using a unique machine-learning technique called anomaly detection to find significant spikes and drops
